column6:
*Save*
Fire guns only at targets that can be hit with high probability.

*Normal*
Conserve gun fire in a balanced manner.

*Aggressive*
Fire at will with all guns!

*Save*
Fire torpedoes only at targets that can be hit with high probability.

*Normal*
Conserve torpedo fire in a balanced manner.

*Aggressive*
Fire at will with torpedoes at closest threat!
